Kyosho K03194A Mazda Savanna RX-3 1973 Fuji Tourist Trophy Pan Am 500 4th Place Y. Okamoto/Y. Terada

Purchased: 2014

The second of Kyosho's recent batch of RX-3s. About as different from the previous livery as you can get. The dashboard seems off to me as it looks like it covers the bottom half of the windscreen. :!: :?:

Although Okamoto and Terada were leading at one point they finished 4th.
